abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.f762e8f471fe875f]{Aid Your Ally}, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.412156232a6d42bf]{Battle}, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger}, or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +wits by leading a group or army and actively giving tactical commands, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Once per fight, when you miss on a move, you may adjust your strategy on the fly. Envision this change and suffer -X momentum. Then add +X where X is any value up to your wits score. This may change the miss to a hit.

Once per fight, when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +wits by studying your foe for a weakness and score a strong hit, you may immediately make the @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} move. If you do and score a hit, inflict +X harm where X is your wits score.
